item.title: New York City Mayor Adams to have 'routine' medical tests, limit schedule
item.description: "Over the last few days, Mayor Adams hasn't been feeling his best," Fabien Levy, deputy mayor for communications, said on social media late Sunday.

item.title: WATCH: Otters show off basketball skills
item.description: Rescued sea otters at the Oregon Zoo in Portland showed off their ability to shoot hoops as part of the zoo's enrichment program.
